summary: Lets you summon the headless horseman to fight for you! He also has some comments while fighting, and his voice is from the vanilla game!
descriptionHtml: This mod allows you to summon the headless horseman! Look up Headless horseman skyrim easter egg for screenshots! He isn\'t on a horse though - He is a ghost and is headless and has some comments from the game! Spell tome is found in Solitude blue palace on the table when you first enter (<I Think that\'s what it\'s called I forgot :3) Oh and obviously he has a axe. :3 DROP IT IN THE DATA FOLDER
author: Me
